hanzi-su-wiki:
場

Значения

Место, поле, форум; сцена; обстоятельство, случай

Мнемоника

  • Земляной 土 плац, освещаемый лучами солнца 昜 с самого утра, а также всё, что на нём происходит.

  • "Хорошая почва 土 и солнце 日. Давайте остановимся на этом месте."

Варианты

场, 塲, 㘯
purpleculture_pinyin:
chǎng
large place used for a specific purpose; stage; scene (of a play); classifier for sporting or recreational activities; classifier for number of exams
большое место, используемое по определенному назначению; сцена; сцена (спектакля); классификатор для занятий спортом или отдыха; классификатор по количеству экзаменов

cháng
threshing floor; classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
гумно; классификатор событий и происшествий: заклинание, эпизод, схватка

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 场)
Pictophonetic: 昜 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 場院 [ cháng yuàn ]: threshing floor
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
    • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up
heisig_chinese_memo: You're looking for a good location (site) to bury your piggy bank savings. It has to be under the sun in some soft soil that's easy to dig up, well hidden, and easy to rememger like this hanzi.
heisig_constituent: location, soil, dirt, ground, piggy bank, sun, day, piglets
koohiiStory1: You´re looking for a good location to bury your piggy bank savings. It has to be in some soft soil that´s easy to dig up, well hidden, and easy to remember like this kanji.
koohiiStory2: Don´t confuse with place (#1127). Think of location not as a single fixed spot, but as the act of locating. You´ve buried your piggy bank in the dirt in your backyard, but you can´t remember where. You frantically dig everywhere in a process of location to find your piggy bank.
jp_example_words:
現場(げんじょう): actual spot, scene, scene of the crime
式場(しきじょう): ceremonial hall, place of ceremony (e.g. marriage)
相場(そうば): market price, speculation, estimation
道場(どうじょう): dojo, hall used for martial arts training, mandala
農場(のうじょう): farm (agriculture)
本場(ほんば): home, habitat, center, best place, genuine
満場(まんじょう): unanimous, whole audience
役場(やくば): town hall
来場(らいじょう): attendance
市場(いちば): town market, the marketplace (economics)
劇場(げきじょう): theatre
現場(げんば): actual spot, scene, scene of the crime
工場(こうば): factory, plant, mill, workshop
酒場(さかば): bar, bar-room
立場(たちば): standpoint, position, situation
登場(とうじょう): entry (on stage), appearance (on screen), entrance, introduction (into a market)
入場(にゅうじょう): entrance, admission, entering
場(ば): place, (physics) field
場所(ばしょ): place, location
場面(ばめん): scene, setting (e.g. of novel)
広場(ひろば): plaza
牧場(ぼくじょう): farm (livestock), pasture land, meadow, grazing land
売り場(うりば): selling area
会場(かいじょう): the place of meeting
工場(こうじょう): factory
駐車場(ちゅうしゃじょう): parking lot
場合(ばあい): case, occasion
飛行場(ひこうじょう): airfield, airport
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Dirt makes it easy to identify your location. If you know that, you can go from place to place.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine looking at the dirt. It's a distinct color and texture, and you're able to identify your location just from that alone.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Knowing your location from dirt is quite a feat! Who taught you that? It was Jourm (じょう), the big local farmhand. Despite being a bit weird, he does really know his dirt and can tell you the place from which any dirt came.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Remember Jourm? He's our local farmhand who only has nine toes (from the 上 mnemonic). Imagine that guy explaining to you how to know your location from dirt. He may be a bit clumsy, but the man really does know his dirt.
Ru_trainchinese:
chǎng: (сч.слово) счетное слово для спортивных мероприятий, фильмов, спектаклей, дождя и др.
chǎng: (графема) место, поле, площадка
cháng: (сущ/сч.слово) ровная открытая площадка; счетное слово для периодов, процессов
Kanshudo_mnemonic: glorious (昜) ground (土) is a place
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The birth site (place) of a piglet is usually just the ground.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " earth " to the sound of "昜". The original meaning is a flat ground for worshipping gods in ancient times. "Said the text": "Field, worship the gods." Such as "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong": "Zigong fights against him, builds a house in the field, lives alone for three years, and then returns." Zhao Qi's note: "The field, the Confucius mound is also a mandala." "Han Shu. "Jiao Si Zhi": "You can know the sacrifices at the four o'clock, the upper and lower mandala, and the surname is the ancestor." Yan Shi's ancient note: "The earth is the altar, and the flat is the field."

" Field " also refers to the flat land where crops are picked up and the grain is dried. "Said Wen": "One said: Zhi Gu Tian also." Such as "Poetry. Bin Feng. "July": "Building a farm in September, and harvesting crops in October." Zheng Xuanjian: "The farm is on the same ground, and when things are born, they are cultivated to grow vegetables until they are mature. ""Zhou Li. Local official Situ. Field Man": "The field field where the field man administers the country, and the fruit of the tree, the precious things, are collected by time."

After " field " refers to premises and venues. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qin Ceyi": "So, I was abandoning literature and martial arts, nurturing the dead, putting on armors and making soldiers, and winning the battlefield." "Speech": "Gong Yu didn't know, he suddenly saw Qizhuang in the hunting ground, he was seven or eight years old."

" Field " can specifically refer to the place where deer inhabit. "Little Erya. Guang Beast: "The place where the rabbit breathes is called the cave, and the place where the deer breathes is called the field." Such as "Poetry. Bin Feng. "Dongshan": "The deer farm in the town is shining at night." Kong Yingdashu: "The deer farm, the farm is the place where the ground is practiced, so knowing the deer is the trace of the deer."

" Field " also refers to the field in general. Such as "Selected Works. Yangtze Cloud "Qin Meixin": "It is the secret mansion, reading the book forest, gathering the space of elegance, soaring to the field of rituals and music." Southern Song Xie Lingyun "You Ming Shan Zhi": "How to use fame and wealth, Virtuous in the realm of Qingkuang!"

" Field " also means loose soil turned up by ants and earthworms. Such as "Selected Works. Pan Anren's "Ji Tian Fu": "Dichang dyed a scorpion, Hong Wei is in hand." Li Shan's note: "Chang, the name of the floating soil. Sound hurt."

" Field " can be used as a quantifier to indicate the course of a period of time, which is equivalent to " return ." For example, Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Dan Ge Xing": "When God saw the jade girl, he laughed a thousand times." "Song History. "Election Record One": "After that, it changed, so I used poems as the first scene, on the second scene, planned the third scene, and posted the fourth scene."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " earth " to the sound of "昜". The original meaning is a flat ground for worshipping gods in ancient times.
humanum_full_description:
從「土」，「昜」聲。本義是古代祭神的平地。《說文》：「場，祭神道也。」如《孟子．滕文公上》：「子貢反，築室於場，獨居三年，然後歸。」趙岐注：「場，孔子冢上祭祀壇場也。」《漢書．郊祀志》：「能知四時犧牲，壇場上下，氏姓所出者，以為宗。」顏師古注：「積土為壇，平地為場。」

　　「場」也表示收拾莊稼、翻曬糧食的平地。《說文》：「一曰：治穀田也。」如《詩．豳風．七月》：「九月築場圃，十月納禾稼。」鄭玄箋：「場圃同地，自物生之時，耕治之以種菜茹，至物盡成熟，築堅以為場。」《周禮．地官司徒．場人》：「場人掌國之場圃，而樹之果蓏珍異之物，以時斂而藏之。」

　　「場」後泛指處所、場地。如《戰國策．秦策一》：「於是，乃廢文任武，厚養死士，綴甲厲兵，效勝於戰場。」《世說新語．言語》：「庾公不知，忽於獵場見齊莊，時年七八歲。」

　　「場」可特指鹿棲息的處所。《小爾雅．廣獸》：「兔之所息謂之窟，鹿之所息謂之場。」如《詩．豳風．東山》：「町畽鹿場，熠燿宵行。」孔穎達疏：「鹿場者，場是踐地之處，故知町疃是鹿之跡也。」

　　「場」也泛指領域。如《文選．揚子雲〈劇秦美新〉》：「是以發祕府，覽書林，遙集乎文雅之囿，翱翔乎禮樂之場。」南朝宋謝靈運〈遊名山志〉：「豈以名利之場，賢於清曠之域邪！」

　　「場」還表示螞蟻、蚯蚓等翻起的鬆散泥土。如《文選．潘安仁〈藉田賦〉》：「坻場染屨，洪縻在手。」李善注：「場，浮壤之名也。音傷。」

　　「場」可作量詞，表示一段事情的經過，相當於「回」。如唐代李白〈短歌行〉：「天公見玉女，大笑億千場。」《宋史．選舉志一》：「厥後變易，遂以詩賦為第一場，論第二場，策第三場，帖經第四場。」
humanum_short_description: 從「土」，「昜」聲。本義是古代祭神的平地。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
場 (Simplified: 场)
Total strokes: 12; Radical: 土
Pictophonetic: 昜 indicates the sound; 土 (earth) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
    • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up
  • Pinyin: chǎng

    English Definition: large place used for a specific purpose; stage; scene (of a play); classifier for sporting or recreational activities; classifier for number of exams
  • Pinyin: cháng

    English Definition: threshing floor; classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
    Example Words:
    場院 [ cháng yuàn ]: threshing floor
    More: 場* | *場 | *場*

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:场

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+573A

Main pronunciation 主要发音: chǎng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning field.

English senses 英语理解: open space, field, market

Usage example 用法举例: 場地 chǎng dì (place)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 295

Shuowen 说文解字: 祭神道也一曰田不耕一曰治穀田也從土昜聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 場 mutant 塲 from potters-clay 土 tǔ and phonetic sundial (𠃓)昜 yáng and see- 殇殤 shāng C062 場<塲> simp 场.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :

Simplification rule :

Simplification rule explained :

Variant rule : C062 場<塲>

Variant rule clarification :
場 (field) TW 塲 <field>

Applied rules : R03 𠃓昜

New font rule :

There is no known bronze characters found. 没.

(Simplified: 场)

  • Chinese Definition:
  • Chinese Definition:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 土 [ tǔ ] soil, earth; items made of earth
    • 昜 [ yáng ] bright, glorious; to expand, to open up
①處所，許多人聚集或活動的地方：場子。場地。場所。
②量詞，用於文娛體育活動：場次。
③比賽地，舞臺：上場。下場。粉墨登場。捧場。
④戲劇作品和戲劇演出中因場景變化或人物上下場而劃分的段落：三幕五場。
⑤物質存在的一種特殊形式：電場。磁場。
①平坦的空地，多指農家翻曬糧食及脫粒的地方：場院。
②量詞，指一事起迄的經過：下了一場雨。
③集，市集：趕場。
場院 [ cháng yuàn ]: threshing floor
(Simplified: 场)

Heisig: Soil . . . piggy bank.
Chinese: You're looking for a good location (site) to bury your piggy bank savings. It has to be under the sun in some soft soil that's easy to dig up, well hidden, and easy to rememger like this hanzi.

從「 土 」，「 昜 」聲。本義是古代祭神的平地。《說文》：「場，祭神道也。」如《孟子．滕文公上》：「子貢反，築室於場，獨居三年，然後歸。」趙岐注：「場，孔子冢上祭祀壇場也。」《漢書．郊祀志》：「能知四時犧牲，壇場上下，氏姓所出者，以為宗。」顏師古注：「積土為壇，平地為場。」 「 場 」也表示收拾莊稼、翻曬糧食的平地。《說文》：「一曰：治穀田也。」如《詩．豳風．七月》：「九月築場圃，十月納禾稼。」鄭玄箋：「場圃同地，自物生之時，耕治之以種菜茹，至物盡成熟，築堅以為場。」《周禮．地官司徒．場人》：「場人掌國之場圃，而樹之果蓏珍異之物，以時斂而藏之。」 「 場 」後泛指處所、場地。如《戰國策．秦策一》：「於是，乃廢文任武，厚養死士，綴甲厲兵，效勝於戰場。」《世說新語．言語》：「庾公不知，忽於獵場見齊莊，時年七八歲。」 「 場 」可特指鹿棲息的處所。《小爾雅．廣獸》：「兔之所息謂之窟，鹿之所息謂之場。」如《詩．豳風．東山》：「町畽鹿場，熠燿宵行。」孔穎達疏：「鹿場者，場是踐地之處，故知町疃是鹿之跡也。」 「 場 」也泛指領域。如《文選．揚子雲〈劇秦美新〉》：「是以發祕府，覽書林，遙集乎文雅之囿，翱翔乎禮樂之場。」南朝宋謝靈運〈遊名山志〉：「豈以名利之場，賢於清曠之域邪！」 「 場 」還表示螞蟻、蚯蚓等翻起的鬆散泥土。如《文選．潘安仁〈藉田賦〉》：「坻場染屨，洪縻在手。」李善注：「場，浮壤之名也。音傷。」 「 場 」可作量詞，表示一段事情的經過，相當於「 回 」。如唐代李白〈短歌行〉：「天公見玉女，大笑億千場。」《宋史．選舉志一》：「厥後變易，遂以詩賦為第一場，論第二場，策第三場，帖經第四場。」

場字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháng］
［《廣韻》直良切，平陽，澄。］
亦作“塲1”。“场1”的繁体字。
(1)翻晒作物和脱粒的平坦空地。
(2)菜圃。
(3)特指场人。
(4)祭坛旁的平地。
(5)道路。
(6)方言。集；市集。
(7)量词。用于事情的经过或行为的次数。
[②]［chǎng］
［《廣韻》直良切，平陽，澄。］
亦作“塲2”。“场2”的繁体字。
(1)处所；多人聚集或事情发生的地方。
(2)指市肆。
(3)五代、宋时煎盐、冶铁、造酒之所与官府所置专卖市肆，皆名场。
(4)指科举时代的考试之所。
(5)指科举考试。
(6)指表演技艺的空地。
(7)特指舞台的前台。
(8)戏剧中的段落。每场表演全剧故事的一个片段。
(9)量词。多用于一桩完整的事情如表演、竞技、考试等。
(10)电视接收机中，电子束对一幅画面的奇数行或偶数行完成一次隔行扫描，叫做一场。奇数场和偶数场合为一帧完整画面。
(11)物质存在的一种基本形式，具有能量、动量和质量，能传递实物间的相互作

場字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　場； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页234第08
【唐韻】直良切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】仲良切，?音長。【說文】祭神道也。【師古曰】築土爲壇，除地爲場。　又收禾圃曰場。【詩·豳風】九月築場圃。【周禮·地官】場人掌國之場圃，而樹之果蓏。　又校士曰文場。【班固·答賔戲】婆娑乎術藝之場。【沈佺期詩】累年同畫省，四海接文場。　又戰爭之地曰戰場。李華有弔古戰場文。　又釋氏開堂設戒曰選佛場。【傳燈錄】丹霞將應舉，道遇一禪客，曰：選官何如選佛。霞曰：選佛當往何所。客曰：江西馬大師出世，此選佛場也。　又【集韻】尸羊切，音商。【揚子·方言】蚍蜉犁鼠之場謂之坻場，一曰浮壤。　場與埸別。或作㙊畼。俗作塲。

field
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cháng］
["Guangyun" Zhiliang cut, Pingyang, Cheng. ]
Also known as "塲1". Traditional characters for "field 1".
(1) Flat open space for turning crops and threshing.
(2) Vegetable garden.
(3) Specifically refers to the field person.
(4) The flat ground beside the altar.
(5) Road.
(6) Dialects. Bazaar
(7) Quantifiers. Used for the number of events or actions.
[②]［chǎng］
["Guangyun" Zhiliang cut, Pingyang, Cheng. ]
Also known as "塲2". Traditional characters for "field 2".
(1) Premises; a place where many people gather or where things happen.
(2) Refers to the market.
(3) In the Five Dynasties and Song Dynasty, the places of salt frying, iron smelting, wine making and the monopoly shops set up by the government were all famous.
(4) Refers to the examination place in the imperial examination era.
(5) Refers to the imperial examination.
(6) Refers to the open space for performing arts.
(7) Especially referring to the front desk of the stage.
(8) Paragraphs in the drama. Each show a fragment of the story of the whole play.
(9) Quantifiers. It is mostly used for a complete thing such as performances, competitions, exams, etc.
(10) In the television receiver, the electron beam completes an interlaced scan on the odd or even lines of a picture, which is called a field. Odd field and even field are a complete picture.
(11) A basic form of material existence, which has energy, momentum and mass, and can transmit interactions between objects.
field

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　chang; Kangxi strokes: 12; page number: page 234 08
[Tang Yun] Zhi Liang cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Zhong Liang cut, long sound. [Said the text] Sacrifice to Shinto. [Shigu said] The earth is built as the altar, and the ground is the field.　Received the field of Hepu. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Building a nursery in September. 【Zhou Li·Diguan】The field where the people control the country, and the fruit of the tree.　Another school scholar called Wenchang. [Banggu·Anping Opera] Whirling in the field of art. [Shen Quanqi Poems] Throughout the years, we have been painting provinces together, and we have received literary fields from all corners of the world.　The place of war is called the battlefield. Li Hua has articles about ancient battlefields.　 Then the Shi family opened a church and set up a precept and said to choose a Buddhist field. [Records of the Lights] Danxia will be lifted, and Dao will meet a Zen guest, saying: How to choose officials is to choose Buddha. Xia said: Choose where to go for the Buddha. The guest said: Jiangxi Master Ma was born, this is also a Buddhist field.　[Jiyun] Corpse and sheep cut, sound quotient. [Yangtze Dialect] The field of the mayfly plow mouse is called the "floating soil".　Farewell to the field. Or make 㙊畼. Vulgar.

Name meaning

cháng, chǎng
вм. 场

場

Значения

Место, поле, форум; сцена; обстоятельство, случай

Мнемоника

  • Земляной 土 плац, освещаемый лучами солнца 昜 с самого утра, а также всё, что на нём происходит.

  • "Хорошая почва 土 и солнце 日. Давайте остановимся на этом месте."

Варианты

场, 塲, 㘯

Radicals: 土, 易  (dirt, easy)
Meaning Mnemonic
Dirt makes it easy to identify your location. If you know that, you can go from place to place.
Imagine looking at the dirt. It's a distinct color and texture, and you're able to identify your location just from that alone.
Reading Mnemonic
Knowing your location from dirt is quite a feat! Who taught you that? It was Jourm (じょう), the big local farmhand. Despite being a bit weird, he does really know his dirt and can tell you the place from which any dirt came.
Remember Jourm? He's our local farmhand who only has nine toes (from the 上 mnemonic). Imagine that guy explaining to you how to know your location from dirt. He may be a bit clumsy, but the man really does know his dirt.
